page.title: 02Education.
page.content: Middleham School. Birch Memorial Church Aided Primary, Park Lane. 79 children on roll July 1985, divided into 3 classes. Staff- Headteacher, 2 full time teachers and 9 hrs part-time teaching assistance. 2 hrs per week remedial teaching help & 12 hrs clerical & N.T.A. Chidren from Middleham, East Witton, Jervaulx and Coverdale. Approx half transported by bus. School day 9-12 ; 1-3.15pm. School built 1977 to replace Middleham Old School and Village Schools at East Witton and Carlton. Children begin in the term in which they are 5 and transfer to secondary school at Leyburn at age 11.School roll has fallen from 110 in 1980 due to falling birth rate. Numbers expected to remain at present level.
